version_description:
- iPad Air & iPad mini Retina support
- German localization
- bugs & typo fix

Added info:
✧ device identity (device name, os version, UDID (if available)) wich can be sent by email;
✧ corrected specs.

✧ corrected and updated specs
✧ iPad retina graphics
✧ system processes (just pull list down)

URL-scheme — aeonika-amonitor://

+ iOS 8 support
+ Compare up to 7 (for iPhone) or 12 (for iPad) models of iDevices (in-App purchase)
+ Widget for Memory and Disk status (iOS 8+ only)

+ Actual tech specs
+ From now tech specs will be downloaded automatically from our server as new data will be available.
+ iPhone 6, 6 Plus, iPad Air 2 support

Sorry for that bug in memory chart. We will fix it soon. Hope, in one-two weeks.
